name: Skull Crew
description:
Play as a Skull Wisp, fighting off continuously spawning red skulls while gathering allied blue Skulls.

Controls

W-A-S-D to Move Player

Use Mouse to Aim & Left Click to Shoot 

- Grab Gold Skulls to up you're Score
- Collect Blue Skulls to tag along and add more Fire Power
- Ward off Red Skulls by shooting them before they get to close


All Sound & Font Assets from Unity Asset Store & 1001 Fonts.
